name: Windsong
description:
Windsong was created on a very tight time schedule for a school project. I took it slightly beyond the scope of what it was originally meant to be, but it is very limited nonetheless. Apologies in advance for the atrocious camera in some levels and the smoke in Red World. 😅
Also, the original version of the game was developed as a downloadable file, so there may be a few small things (like the X on the main menu) that don't work in the browser version.

Fullscreen is recommended!
